ch.pschatzmann.stocks.accounting

  • Packages that use ch.pschatzmann.stocks.accounting 
    Package Description
    ch.pschatzmann.stocks
    Stock data
    ch.pschatzmann.stocks.accounting
    Accounting: Reporting on account and portfolio values
    ch.pschatzmann.stocks.accounting.kpi
    KPI to evaluate the trading strategies based on the values of the account
    ch.pschatzmann.stocks.execution
    Automatic Trading
    ch.pschatzmann.stocks.integration
    Integration to other applications (charting, ta4j)

    Allocation of stocks
    ch.pschatzmann.stocks.strategy.optimization
    Optimizations of Parameter Values
    ch.pschatzmann.stocks.strategy.selection
    Selection of Best Stocks
    ch.pschatzmann.stocks.ta4j.indicator
    Additinal ta4j Indicators
    ch.pschatzmann.stocks.utils
    Additional generic Utility Classes

    Class Description

    IHistoricValue
    Interface for Value at Date
    Portfolio
    Stock Portfolio information for a specific date.
    PortfolioStockInfo
    Individual line of the portfolio which represents the kpis for an individual stock.
    Transaction
    Order to buy or sell an individual stock.
    Transaction.Action
    Requested Action
    Transaction.BuyOrSell
    Automatically Determined if Buy or Sell
    Transaction.Type
    Type of Order (Market, Limit, Stop...)
